title: Global automotive industry : capacity and assembly volume 2015/2022
summary: This grouped bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis of Country representing North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America.
The highest category is found at 2022 with a mean value of 23.516666666666666.
The second highest category is found at 2015 with a mean value of 20.933333333333334.
